name: Modern Limo City Drive 3d
description:
Do you want to become Modern Limo City Drive 3d
? Learn driving skills and follow traffic rules in this Modern Limo City Drive 3d limo car driver game and prove yourself as skilled chauffeur.

You have the challenge to complete the level in this 3D parking game well in time. Find parking spot before the time ends. Although limousine requires better driving skills, but we are sure that you will show your driving skills on curvy roads of Simulator Parking Plaza.

Precision driving is a challenge in career mode and also drive to the raised platform to park your luxury limousine. Check how you can drive this luxurious limo in this 3D parking game. You have to make wider turns to turn your vehicle as it is longer than a regular car, jeep or turbo vehicle. You can compare it with a heavy monster truck or a luxury bus.

FEATURES:
Realistic wedding environment
Modern luxury car models of limousine
Advanced reliable and smooth limo action
Super fantastic climate and inspiring mission
